testsuite.name: com.tutuka.redis.PubSubConsumerTest

testcase.name: Test consume when failed to connect to publish server multiple times then retry and succeed after exponentialBackOff
Test consume failed when error to connect or read from redis queue
Test consume failed when message is having missing PAYLOAD
Test consume failed when message is having missing CHANNEL
